snippet: Putting an American-educated foreign minister in charge of talks that have made no progress for years would be a significant departure for Iran.
abstract: Iran indicates that its new Foreign Min Mohammad Javad Zarif, American-educated diplomat with deep understanding of United States, may assume additional role of leading Iranian delegation in talks with major powers over Iran's disputed nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: Putting an American-educated foreign minister in charge of talks that have made no progress for years would be a significant departure for Iran.

headline.main: Iran Hints Nuclear Talks Could Include New Official
headline.print_headline: Iran Hints Nuclear Talks Could Include New Official
